text: I spoke to a couple of animators last night and I'm slightly panicking now about getting my showreel ready and good enough for internships haha

I'd say your body mechanic work is almost done, you just need to get anything that's blocked to be on spline, but its really strong. You still have a couple of months to perfect your lipsync work so I wouldn't panic, and remember that internships aren't everything, I never got accepted for one, not even the bluezoo one, but I still got a job there straight out of graduation :slightly_smiling_face:
did you film reference for your 'cat' lipsync shot?
